original_title: Texas Democrat Talarico took $59K from Republican billionaire Adelson | Fox News
article_summary: Texas Democrat James Talarico, who has criticized big-donor influence in elections, received nearly $60,000 in donations from Republican megadonor Miriam Adelson, despite his opposition to such contributions. This comes as Talarico and fellow Democrats attempted to block the passage of a redistricting bill in Texas.</s>
